mapper.insert: insert into schedule (id, user_id, place, start_time, end_time, "completion time", create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{completionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update schedule set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, "completion time" = #{completionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, place, start_time, end_time, "completion time", create_time, update_time from schedule where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, user_id, place, start_time, end_time, "completion time", create_time, update_time from schedule
